https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Vb2OolA0VLVUV7rfzUfDFNxZRY.jpg Sena has had a care-free deco-truck business, but one day, she receives a strange request by a cheap hoodlum, Takizawa, to carry a blind stripper, Azumi, to a certain location. She reluctantly accepts it, but yakuza members begin a persistent search for Takizawa, who turns out to have stolen their companyâ€™s money. Here comes the long-awaited new deco-truck series featuring the idol, Saori Hara, rolling down the highway on a ton of love, action, and steam! Decotora Gal 3: Sena
